channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 7th May
item.description:
Debris FW ENWD Give and take TM Opposite 324 Remove fallen tree branches (Debris/Obstruction in CW)

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th May
item.description:
Email received 06/05/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that a tree at the location is overhanging the Bus Shelter and has damaged a bus that has pulled up alongside it.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 7th May
item.description:
28 day with lane closure needed temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference please remove x1 600x600x20mm slab and replace with tarmac patch due to uneven footway stats required number 1 best out of hours (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)

item.title: Disintegrating road around manhole cover, 7th May
item.description:
This is one of many manhole cover in Finlay Way that need to be repaired and upgraded to meet the needs of the increase traffic and quantity of Heavy Duty lorries. "If a jobs worth doing its worth doing it well"

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly repaired existing pothole, 7th May
item.description:
Area where the road has been widened and repaired several times. The amount of times the road has been repaired at several locations could have paid for the entire road to be relayed. STOP WASTING OUR MONEY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly repaired road, 7th May
item.description:
This area has been repaired several times so stop wasting our money and do it properly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
